text.div:
Generated Narrative: ImplementationGuide ch.fhir.ig.ch-lab-report

CH_LAB_REPORT

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://fhir.ch/ig/ch-lab-report/ImplementationGuide/ch.fhir.ig.ch-lab-report

FHIR® Implementation Guide for Laboratory Reports in Switzerland

name: CH_LAB_REPORT
title: CH LAB-Report (R4)
description: FHIR® Implementation Guide for Laboratory Reports in Switzerland

extension.valueMarkdown: Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on HL7 Terminology
Automatically added as a dependency - all IGs depend on the HL7 Extension Pack

resource.name: CH LAB Observation Results: eGFR
resource.description: Renal function can be determined by laboratory measurement of serum creatinine, from which the estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR) can be calculated.

resource.name: CH LAB Observation Results: eGFR-CKD-EPI(ASR) 2009 Profile for blacks and non-blacks
resource.description:
Renal function can be determined by laboratory measurement of serum creatinine, from 
which the estimated glomerular (eGFR_CKD_EPI) filtration rate can be calculated. Further input parameters are age, race, gender, body height and weight.
 
Use [this calculator:](https://nierenrechner.de/index.php?page=egfr-ckd-rechner)
or [GFR Calculators:](http://www.mdrd.com/)

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Additive Substance
resource.description: This profile defines how to represent Specimen Additive Substances in HL7 FHIR for the purpose of this guide.

resource.name: CH LAB-Report BloodGroup Antibody Result (SNOMED CT coded substances)
resource.description:
This value set is used in the ChLabObservationBloodGroup profile. It contains results of Blood Group Antibodies
(substance) coded with SNOMED CT. It is used in the ChLabObservationBloodGroup profile

resource.name: CH LAB-Report BloodGroup Antibody Screen Test (LOINC codes)
resource.description:
This value set is used in the ChLabObservationBloodGroup profile. It represents
atypical IgG antibodies prior to transfusion or during pregnancy. The screening test is designed
specifically to detect IgG antibodies and some IgM antibodies (non ABO) may also be detected.
Antibodies detected by the antibody screen should then be identified, and a titer performed if
the antibody identified is considered to be clinically significant during pregnancy.

resource.name: CH LAB-Report BloodGroup Immunohematology Tests (SNOMED CT coded procedures)
resource.description: This value set is used in the ChLabObservationBloodGroup profile. It contains Laboratory tests related to immunohematology

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Codes for eGFR (MDRD)
resource.description: ValueSet for the allowed eGFR among males and eGFR among females codes

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Codes for eGFR in CKD-EPI
resource.description: ValueSet for the allowed eGFRcr and eGFRcr-cys codes among non-blacks

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Codes for eGFR in CKD-EPI 2021
resource.description: ValueSet for the allowed eGFRcr and eGFRcr-cys codes, has no race term

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Codes for Erythrocyte Distribuiton Width Test
resource.description: ValueSet for the allowed codes ENTVOL and RATIO

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Composition: Laboratory Report
resource.description: This profile constrains the Composition resource for the purpose of laboratory test reports in Switzerland.

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Device: Analyzer
resource.description: Holds Laboratory Analyzer Data.

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Device: TestKit
resource.description: Holds Laboratory Test-Kit Data.

resource.name: CH LAB-Report DiagnosticReport: Laboratory Report
resource.description: This profile constrains the DiagnosticReport resource for the purpose of laboratory test reports in Switzerland.

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Document: Laboratory Report
resource.description: This profile constrains the Bundle resource for the purpose of laboratory test reports in Switzerland.

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Observation Results CBC Panel - Blood by Automated count, Results in nested Profiles
resource.description: This panel is the traditional hemogram plus platelet count which must now be reported with with hemograms according to current US re-imbursement rule The panel includes 2 different RDWs to accommodate the two different ways of reporting them. (Most automated instruments report as a percent ). The hemoglobin produced by the automatic counters does not use a counting method to generate the hemoglobin so we have used the fotometry version of hemoglobin in this panel.

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Observation Results CBC Panel - Blood by Automated count, Results in sliced component
resource.description: Profile for observation laboratory result of automated Count of Blood Cells. We choose as Unit 10⁹/L or 10¹²/L for Cell Count.

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Observation Results: Albumin/Creatinine Ratio in Urine
resource.description: This profile constrains the ChLabObservationSingleTest profile determine ratio of the concentration of albumin and creatinine in urine.

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Observation Results: Blood Group
resource.description:
Profile to report Blood Group and RhD data. In addition to the code element valuesets delivered from EU Laboratory we have added
3 supplement value sets: CH LAB-Report BloodGroup Antibody Screen Test Result, CH LAB-Report BloodGroup Antibody Result, CH LAB-Report BloodGroup Immunohematology
Tests. These value sets have a candidate binding, i.e. they are candidates to substitute general value sets in some
defined situations.

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Observation Results: eGFR - MDRD Profile for male and female Patients, components for blacks and non-blacks
resource.description:
Renal function can be determined by laboratory measurement of serum creatinine, from which the estimated glomerular
(eGFR_MDMR) filtration rate can be calculated. Further input parameters are age, race and gender.  
Note: The MDRD equation is hardly used any more and is replaced by the CKD-EPI equation.  
[GFR Calculators:](http://www.mdrd.com/)

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Observation Results: eGFR-CKD-EPI(AS) 2021 Creatinin/Cystatin-C based Profile
resource.description:
Glomerular filtration rate (GFR) is considered the best overall index of kidney function; 
however measured GFR is not practical in the routine clinical setting. Estimated glomerular filtration 
rate (eGFR) is a suitable alternative and can be calculated for adults >= 18 years using an equation 
incorporating the patient's age, gender, and measured serum/plasma/blood creatinine only (eGFRcr) (this term) 
or both serum/plasma/blood creatinine and serum/plasma cystatin-C (eGFRcr-cys) [LOINC: 98979-8](https://loinc.org/98979-8/).
The serum/plasma/blood creatinine value is based on a measurement procedure that is traceable to the isotope dilution
mass spectrometry (IDMS) reference measurement procedure for creatinine. The 2021 CKD-EPI equations used for 
eGFRcr and eGFRcr-cys do not have a race term as does the older estimating equations that they replace.
[https://www.nejm.org/doi/pdf/10.1056/NEJMoa2102953](https://www.nejm.org/doi/pdf/10.1056/NEJMoa2102953)

There is a [corresponding calculator](https://www.kidney.org/professionals/gfr_calculator)

For children below 18 y there is a [Pediatric GFR Calculator](https://www.kidney.org/professionals/kdoqi/gfr_calculatorPed)

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Observation Results: Erythrocyte distribution width by Automated count
resource.description: This profile constrains the ChLabObservationSingleTest profile for the purpose of laboratory Erythrocyte Distribuition Width in Switzerland.

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Observation Results: Mean Corpuscular Hemoglobin MCH

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Observation Results: Panel
resource.description: This profile constrains the ChLabObservationResultsLaboratory profile to represent only a panel / battery of laboratory test results for the HL7 Swiss project. The top-level observation contains only further observations-panels and observations-single-tests in the hasMember element. The observation-panels may carry a conclusion in the note element and/or a global interpretation by the producer of the study, in the interpretation element; value[x] and component elements are not allowed and have to be shown in the observation-single-test profile.

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Observation Results: Platelet Count
resource.description: This profile constrains the ChLabObservationSingleTest profile for the purpose of laboratory platelet count.

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Observation Results: Platelet Distribution Width
resource.description: This profile constrains the ChLabObservationSingleTest profile for the purpose of laboratory platelet count.

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Observation Results: Platelet Mean Volume
resource.description: This profile constrains the ChLabObservationSingleTest profile for the purpose of laboratory platelet mean volume.

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Observation Results: Renal Insufficiency Panel
resource.description: This panel collects the lab results in relation to renal insufiency.

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Observation Results: Single Test
resource.description: This profile constrains the ChLabObservationResultsLaboratory profile to represent single test results for the  HL7 Swiss project. The profile enables only value[x] and component elements, hasMember elemens are not allowed

resource.name: CH LAB-Report Patient
